description.zh-cn: 中国同盟会会员、中华民国大陆时期著名刺客。他组织了“斧头帮”和“铁血锄奸团”，策划并实施了针对徐国梁、宋子文、汪精卫及多名日本军政要员的暗杀行动。最终在广西梧州被军统特务刺杀身亡。
description.en: A member of the Tongmenghui and a famous assassin during the Republic of China era. He organized the 'Axe Gang' and the 'Iron and Blood鋤奸団', planning and executing assassinations against figures such as Xu Guoliang, T. V. Soong, Wang Jingwei, and several Japanese military and political officials. He was eventually assassinated by Juntong agents in Wuzhou, Guangxi.

description.zh-cn: 安徽省的一座城市，是王亚樵的出生地。
description.en: A city in Anhui Province, the birthplace of Wang Yaqiao.

description.zh-cn: 广西省的一座城市，是王亚樵的遇刺身亡地点。
description.en: A city in Guangxi Province, the place where Wang Yaqiao was assassinated.

description.zh-cn: 清末由孙中山等组织的革命团体，王亚樵早年曾加入。
description.en: A revolutionary group organized by Sun Yat-sen and others in the late Qing Dynasty, which Wang Yaqiao joined in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 1921年由王亚樵在上海组织的帮派，因成员常持斧头而得名，曾与黄金荣、杜月笙等地头势力争夺地盘。
description.en: A gang organized by Wang Yaqiao in Shanghai in 1921, named for its members often carrying axes. It competed for territory with local powers like Huang Jinrong and Du Yuesheng.

description.zh-cn: 上海青帮头目，其势力曾与王亚樵的斧头帮发生冲突。
description.en: A leader of the Green Gang in Shanghai, whose forces clashed with Wang Yaqiao's Axe Gang.

description.zh-cn: 上海青帮头目，其势力曾与王亚樵的斧头帮发生冲突。
description.en: A leader of the Green Gang in Shanghai, whose forces clashed with Wang Yaqiao's Axe Gang.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国大陆时期浙江军阀，在与江苏军阀齐燮元的斗争中得到王亚樵的支持。
description.en: A warlord of Zhejiang during the Republic of China era, who received support from Wang Yaqiao in his struggle against Jiangsu warlord Qi Xieyuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国大陆时期江苏军阀，其任命的淞沪上海警察厅厅长徐国梁被王亚樵刺杀。
description.en: A warlord of Jiangsu during the Republic of China era. The police chief he appointed, Xu Guoliang, was assassinated by Wang Yaqiao.

description.zh-cn: 时任淞沪上海警察厅厅长，由齐燮元任命，于1923年11月12日被王亚樵派人刺杀。
description.en: Serving as the chief of the Shanghai-Songhu Police Department, appointed by Qi Xieyuan, he was assassinated by Wang Yaqiao's men on November 12, 1923.

description.zh-cn: 即第二次直奉战争期间的江浙战争，徐国梁被刺杀是其导火索之一。
description.en: The Jiangsu-Zhejiang War during the Second Zhili-Fengtian War. The assassination of Xu Guoliang was one of its triggers.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事委员会调查统计局（军统）负责人。早年曾为王亚樵的部下，后奉蒋介石之命，策划并最终成功刺杀了王亚樵。
description.en: Head of the Bureau of Investigation and Statistics of the Military Commission (Juntong) of the Republic of China. He was once a subordinate of Wang Yaqiao in his early years but later, under Chiang Kai-shek's orders, planned and successfully assassinated Wang Yaqiao.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军将领，早年曾是王亚樵的门生。
description.en: A general of the Republic of China Army, who was a student of Wang Yaqiao in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国大陆时期军阀，曾与齐燮元联手击败卢永祥。
description.en: A warlord during the Republic of China era who, along with Qi Xieyuan, defeated Lu Yongxiang.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治及军事领袖。因王亚樵多次策划针对其的刺杀行动，他下令军统缉拿并刺杀王亚樵。
description.en: A political and military leader of the Republic of China. Due to Wang Yaqiao's multiple assassination plots against him, he ordered the Juntong to capture and assassinate Wang.

description.zh-cn: 1931年由王亚樵组织的团体，旨在通过暗杀手段清除汉奸和政治对手，策划了刺杀宋子文等行动。
description.en: An organization formed by Wang Yaqiao in 1931, aimed at eliminating traitors and political opponents through assassination. It planned operations such as the assassination of T. V. Soong.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家、外交家。1931年7月23日，王亚樵的铁血锄奸团在上海北火车站策划刺杀他，但他幸免于难，其秘书唐腴庐被误杀。
description.en: A statesman and diplomat of the Republic of China. On July 23, 1931, Wang Yaqiao's Iron and Blood锄奸団 plotted to assassinate him at the Shanghai North Railway Station, but he escaped unharmed while his secretary Tang Yulu was killed by mistake.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文的秘书，在针对宋子文的刺杀行动中被误杀。
description.en: Secretary to T. V. Soong, who was mistakenly killed during an assassination attempt on Soong.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军的一支部队，在一·二八事变（淞沪抗战）中抵抗日军，期间得到王亚樵的积极配合。
description.en: A unit of the National Revolutionary Army that resisted the Japanese forces during the January 28 Incident (Shanghai War of 1932), during which it received active cooperation from Wang Yaqiao.

description.zh-cn: 日本海军装甲巡洋舰，在淞沪抗战期间被王亚樵派水手用水雷炸伤。
description.en: An armored cruiser of the Imperial Japanese Navy, which was damaged by mines deployed by sailors sent by Wang Yaqiao during the Shanghai War of 1932.

en: Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜半岛在日占时期的流亡政府。王亚樵曾与其负责人安昌浩合作，共同策划了虹口公园爆炸案。
description.en: A government-in-exile of the Korean Peninsula during the Japanese occupation. Wang Yaqiao collaborated with its leader, Ahn Changho, to plan the Hongkou Park bombing.

description.zh-cn: 韩国独立运动家，时任大韩民国临时政府负责人，与王亚樵合作策划了虹口公园爆炸案。
description.en: A Korean independence activist and a leader of the Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea, who collaborated with Wang Yaqiao to plan the Hongkou Park bombing.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜独立运动家，在与王亚樵合作的虹口公园爆炸案中，负责在现场执行投弹任务。
description.en: A Korean independence activist who, in collaboration with Wang Yaqiao, carried out the bombing at the Hongkou Park incident.

description.zh-cn: 1932年4月29日，由王亚樵策划、尹奉吉执行的一次针对日本军政要员的炸弹袭击事件，导致多名日方高官死伤。
description.en: On April 29, 1932, a bomb attack targeting Japanese military and political officials, planned by Wang Yaqiao and executed by Yun Bong-gil, resulted in the death or injury of several high-ranking Japanese officials.

description.zh-cn: 日本驻沪居民团行政委员长，在虹口公园爆炸案中当场被炸死。
description.en: The administrative chairman of the Japanese Residents' Association in Shanghai, who was killed instantly in the Hongkou Park bombing.

description.zh-cn: 日本陆军大将，时任上海派遣军司令，在虹口公园爆炸案中身受重伤，后不治身亡。
description.en: A general in the Imperial Japanese Army and commander of the Shanghai Expeditionary Army, who was severely wounded in the Hongkou Park bombing and later died from his injuries.

description.zh-cn: 日本陆军中将，时任第九师团长，在虹口公园爆炸案中被炸断一条腿。
description.en: A lieutenant general in the Imperial Japanese Army and commander of the 9th Division, who lost a leg in the Hongkou Park bombing.

description.zh-cn: 日本驻华公使，在虹口公园爆炸案中被炸断一条腿。
description.en: The Japanese Minister to China, who lost a leg in the Hongkou Park bombing.

description.zh-cn: 日本海军中将，时任第三舰队司令，在虹口公园爆炸案中被炸瞎一只眼。
description.en: A vice admiral in the Imperial Japanese Navy and commander of the 3rd Fleet, who was blinded in one eye during the Hongkou Park bombing.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事家、政治家。他发动了福建事变，后来为躲避军统追杀的王亚樵提供了庇护。
description.en: A Chinese military figure and politician. He launched the Fujian Incident and later provided refuge for Wang Yaqiao, who was fleeing from Juntong assassins.

description.zh-cn: 1933年由蔡廷锴、李济深等发动的反蒋事变，王亚樵曾前往福州参与。
description.en: An anti-Chiang Kai-shek rebellion launched by Cai Tingkai, Li Jishen, and others in 1933, which Wang Yaqiao traveled to Fuzhou to join.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党重要政治人物。1935年11月1日，在由王亚樵等人策划的刺杀中，被孙凤鸣连击三枪，身受重伤。
description.en: A prominent political figure in the Kuomintang. On November 1, 1935, he was shot three times and severely wounded by Sun Fengming in an assassination attempt planned by Wang Yaqiao and others.

description.zh-cn: 刺客，于1935年11月1日在中国国民党中央四届六中全会会场行刺汪精卫。
description.en: An assassin who, on November 1, 1935, attempted to assassinate Wang Jingwei at the 6th Plenary Session of the 4th Central Committee of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 胡汉民的亲信。根据张学良的说法，他出资收买了王亚樵去刺杀汪精卫等人。
description.en: A confidant of Hu Hanmin. According to Zhang Xueliang, he financed Wang Yaqiao to assassinate Wang Jingwei and others.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党元老，其亲信刘庐隐据称收买了王亚樵执行暗杀任务。
description.en: A Kuomintang elder whose confidant, Liu Luyin, allegedly hired Wang Yaqiao for assassination missions.

nodes.id: 军事委员会调查统计局

zh-cn: 军事委员会调查统计局

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的主要情报机关之一，由戴笠长期负责。在蒋介石的命令下，该组织负责追捕并最终刺杀了王亚樵。
description.en: One of the main intelligence agencies of the Republic of China, long headed by Dai Li. Under Chiang Kai-shek's orders, the organization was responsible for hunting down and ultimately assassinating Wang Yaqiao.

description.zh-cn: 王亚樵的部下。他被军统逮捕后，其妻余婉君被戴笠利用来设局诱杀王亚樵。
description.en: A subordinate of Wang Yaqiao. After his arrest by the Juntong, his wife Yu Wanjun was used by Dai Li to set a trap to assassinate Wang Yaqiao.

description.zh-cn: 余立奎的妻子。她被戴笠以金钱和释放其丈夫为条件买通，随后将王亚樵诱至军统的埋伏圈，导致王亚樵被杀。
description.en: Wife of Yu Likui. She was bribed by Dai Li with money and the promise of her husband's release, and subsequently lured Wang Yaqiao into a Juntong ambush, leading to his death.

description.zh-cn: 王亚樵出生于安徽省合肥磨店乡。
description.en: Wang Yaqiao was born in Modian Township, Hefei, Anhui Province.

description.zh-cn: 王亚樵早年参加了同盟会。
description.en: Wang Yaqiao joined the Tongmenghui in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 1921年，王亚樵在上海将一个同乡会改组为“斧头帮”。
description.en: In 1921, Wang Yaqiao reorganized a fellow provincials' association in Shanghai into the 'Axe Gang'.

description.zh-cn: 王亚樵领导的斧头帮曾与黄金荣的势力在上海互争地盘。
description.en: The Axe Gang, led by Wang Yaqiao, competed for territory with Huang Jinrong's forces in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 王亚樵领导的斧头帮曾与杜月笙的势力在上海互争地盘。
description.en: The Axe Gang, led by Wang Yaqiao, competed for territory with Du Yuesheng's forces in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 在江浙军阀斗争中，王亚樵支持浙江军阀卢永祥。
description.en: During the conflict between Jiangsu and Zhejiang warlords, Wang Yaqiao supported Zhejiang warlord Lu Yongxiang.

description.zh-cn: 在江浙军阀斗争中，王亚樵与江苏军阀齐燮元对立。
description.en: During the conflict between Jiangsu and Zhejiang warlords, Wang Yaqiao opposed Jiangsu warlord Qi Xieyuan.

description.zh-cn: 1923年11月12日，王亚樵组织手下刺杀了由齐燮元任命的淞沪上海警察厅厅长徐国梁。
description.en: On November 12, 1923, Wang Yaqiao organized his men to assassinate Xu Guoliang, the chief of the Shanghai-Songhu Police Department appointed by Qi Xieyuan.

description.zh-cn: 王亚樵策划的徐国梁刺杀案成为甲子兵灾（江浙战争）的导火索之一。
description.en: The assassination of Xu Guoliang, planned by Wang Yaqiao, became one of the triggers for the Jiazi War (Jiangsu-Zhejiang War).

description.zh-cn: 1923年，戴笠曾在王亚樵手下担任中队长。
description.en: In 1923, Dai Li served as a squadron leader under Wang Yaqiao.

description.zh-cn: 国军将领胡宗南早年是王亚樵的门生。
description.en: KMT General Hu Zongnan was a protégé of Wang Yaqiao in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 孙传芳与齐燮元联手击败了卢永祥。
description.en: Sun Chuanfang, together with Qi Xieyuan, defeated Lu Yongxiang.

description.zh-cn: 四·一二事件后，王亚樵对蒋介石非常不满，并多次策划刺杀蒋介石。
description.en: After the April 12 Incident, Wang Yaqiao became extremely dissatisfied with Chiang Kai-shek and planned multiple assassination attempts against him.

description.zh-cn: 1931年，王亚樵组织了“铁血锄奸团”。
description.en: In 1931, Wang Yaqiao organized the 'Iron and Blood锄奸団'.

description.zh-cn: 1931年7月23日，王亚樵领导的铁血锄奸团在上海北火车站刺杀宋子文，但未成功。
description.en: On July 23, 1931, the Iron and Blood锄奸団, led by Wang Yaqiao, attempted to assassinate T. V. Soong at the Shanghai North Railway Station, but failed.

description.zh-cn: 在刺杀宋子文的行动中，铁血锄奸团的刺客误杀了宋子文的秘书唐腴庐。
description.en: During the assassination attempt on T. V. Soong, assassins from the Iron and Blood锄奸団 mistakenly killed Soong's secretary, Tang Yulu.

description.zh-cn: 在淞沪抗战期间，王亚樵积极配合十九路军抵抗日军。
description.en: During the Shanghai War of 1932, Wang Yaqiao actively cooperated with the 19th Route Army to resist the Japanese forces.

description.zh-cn: 淞沪抗战期间，王亚樵派水手用水雷炸伤了日本海军的“出云”号旗舰。
description.en: During the Shanghai War of 1932, Wang Yaqiao dispatched sailors to damage the Japanese flagship, cruiser Izumo, with naval mines.

description.zh-cn: 王亚樵与流亡上海的大韩民国临时政府合作，共同策划了虹口公园爆炸案。
description.en: Wang Yaqiao collaborated with the Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea, exiled in Shanghai, to jointly plan the Hongkou Park bombing.

description.zh-cn: 王亚樵为虹口公园爆炸案制定了周密计划，并提供了资金和武器。
description.en: Wang Yaqiao formulated a detailed plan for the Hongkou Park bombing and provided funds and weapons.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜志士尹奉吉与王亚樵合作，在虹口公园爆炸案中负责执行投弹任务。
description.en: Korean patriot Yun Bong-gil collaborated with Wang Yaqiao and was responsible for carrying out the bombing mission in the Hongkou Park incident.

description.zh-cn: 日本驻沪居民团行政委员长河端贞次在虹口公园爆炸案中当场被炸死。
description.en: Kawabata Sadaji, the administrative chairman of the Japanese Residents' Association in Shanghai, was killed instantly in the Hongkou Park bombing.

description.zh-cn: 日本上海派遣军司令白川义则大将在虹口公园爆炸案中重伤，后不治身亡。
description.en: General Yoshinori Shirakawa, commander of the Shanghai Expeditionary Army, was severely wounded in the Hongkou Park bombing and later died from his injuries.

description.zh-cn: 日本陆军中将植田谦吉在虹口公园爆炸案中被炸断一条腿。
description.en: Lieutenant General Kenkichi Ueda of the Japanese Army lost a leg in the Hongkou Park bombing.

description.zh-cn: 日本驻华公使重光葵在虹口公园爆炸案中被炸断一条腿。
description.en: Japanese Minister to China, Mamoru Shigemitsu, lost a leg in the Hongkou Park bombing.

description.zh-cn: 日本海军中将野村吉三郎在虹口公园爆炸案中被炸瞎一只眼。
description.en: Vice Admiral Kichisaburō Nomura of the Japanese Navy was blinded in one eye in the Hongkou Park bombing.

description.zh-cn: 王亚樵于1933年赴福州参加了李济深等人发动的福建事变。
description.en: In 1933, Wang Yaqiao went to Fuzhou to participate in the Fujian Incident launched by Li Jishen and others.

description.zh-cn: 福建事变失败后，王亚樵再次筹划刺杀行动，于1935年11月1日策划了针对汪精卫的刺杀，致其重伤。
description.en: After the failure of the Fujian Incident, Wang Yaqiao planned another assassination, targeting Wang Jingwei on November 1, 1935, which left him severely injured.

description.zh-cn: 在王亚樵的策划下，孙凤鸣于1935年11月1日以记者身份混入会场，开枪行刺汪精卫，致其重伤。
description.en: Under the planning of Wang Yaqiao, Sun Fengming disguised himself as a journalist, infiltrated the venue on November 1, 1935, and shot Wang Jingwei, severely wounding him.

description.zh-cn: 根据张学良的说法，胡汉民的亲信刘庐隐出资收买王亚樵，指使其刺杀汪精卫等人。
description.en: According to Zhang Xueliang, Liu Luyin, a confidant of Hu Hanmin, paid Wang Yaqiao to assassinate Wang Jingwei and others.

description.zh-cn: 刘庐隐是胡汉民的亲信。
description.en: Liu Luyin was a confidant of Hu Hanmin.

relationships.target: 军事委员会调查统计局

description.zh-cn: 在汪精卫遇刺后，蒋介石震怒，要求军统缉拿王亚樵。
description.en: After the assassination attempt on Wang Jingwei, a furious Chiang Kai-shek ordered the Juntong to hunt down Wang Yaqiao.

relationships.source: 军事委员会调查统计局

description.zh-cn: 在戴笠的指挥下，军统特务通过收买王亚樵部下之妻设下陷阱，于1936年10月20日在广西梧州将王亚樵枪杀。
description.en: Under the command of Dai Li, Juntong agents set a trap by bribing the wife of one of Wang Yaqiao's subordinates, and assassinated Wang Yaqiao in Wuzhou, Guangxi, on October 20, 1936.

description.zh-cn: 余婉君被军统买通后，约王亚樵见面，将其诱入军统的埋伏圈，导致王亚樵被杀。
description.en: After being bribed by the Juntong, Yu Wanjun arranged a meeting with Wang Yaqiao, luring him into a Juntong ambush which resulted in his death.

relationships.source: 军事委员会调查统计局

description.zh-cn: 军统负责人戴笠以十万银圆及释放其丈夫余立奎为条件，买通了余婉君，让她协助诱杀王亚樵。
description.en: Juntong leader Dai Li bribed Yu Wanjun with 100,000 silver dollars and the release of her husband Yu Likui, persuading her to help lure and kill Wang Yaqiao.

description.zh-cn: 余婉君是王亚樵部下余立奎的妻子。
description.en: Yu Wanjun was the wife of Yu Likui, a subordinate of Wang Yaqiao.

description.zh-cn: 余立奎是王亚樵的部下之一。
description.en: Yu Likui was one of Wang Yaqiao's subordinates.

relationships.source: 军事委员会调查统计局

description.zh-cn: 在追捕王亚樵的过程中，军统逮捕了其部下余立奎。
description.en: In the pursuit of Wang Yaqiao, the Juntong arrested his subordinate Yu Likui.

description.zh-cn: 为躲避军统追杀，王亚樵逃往广西投奔李济深，并获得其庇护。
description.en: To escape the Juntong's pursuit, Wang Yaqiao fled to Guangxi to seek refuge with Li Jishen, who provided him with shelter.
